title: WTF is with skirmish devour on ww
body:
I know that before when people called ww op are silly but now... not so much.
with the devour smite and wits end then just one ww ult he can solo kill a mid laner on almost full hp. and you cant do anything about it because the suppressing factor of his ult. You removed leblacc's silence because there was no counter play to her damage then you introduce this silly new jungle item that has insane synergy on warwick who is also really strong now even without the item because hoe much sustain he has that is essential in the new jungle. 

And here i thought you learnt you're lesson after the feral flare fiasco 

What the actual hell.
